body: Indian blogger Aarkay grew up listening regularly to BBC Hindi service. The blogger comments: "the news that the BBC is going to discontinue its radio Hindi service has come as a rude shock to me".
original_body: Indian blogger Aarkay grew up listening regularly to BBC Hindi service. The blogger comments: "the news that the BBC is going to discontinue its radio Hindi service has come as a rude shock to me".
title: India: The Closure Of BBC Hindi Service Is A Shock To Many

sentence: Indian blogger Aarkay grew up listening regularly to BBC Hindi service.
The blogger comments: "the news that the BBC is going to discontinue its radio Hindi service has come as a rude shock to me".
